channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Novo Nordisk shares surging on new weight-loss-drug development
S&P 500 defies Friday’s premarket downtrend to build on all-time-high close
Heidi Montag and Spencer Pratt are suing Los Angeles after losing their home to wildfires, claiming the city neglected to fix a reservoir that was out of commission for almost a year
item.description: The couple, who rose to stardom on "Laguna Beach" spinoff “The Hills," filed the lawsuit Tuesday with more than 20 other property owners and residents...

item.title: Facebook parent Meta now plans to spend way more than previously thought on AI
Diageo is said to review drinks portfolio to reignite growth
item.description: Diageo is already looking to sell Ciroc vodka, and could look to dispose of other underperforming labels. The company's 34% stake in LVMH’s drinks div...

item.title: Disney paid Bob Iger $41 million last year—a 30% increase over the year before
item.description: It’s still significantly less than Iger’s compensation in 2018, when he took home $65.6 million.

item.title: Patagonia CEO: The ‘energy emergency’ is disingenuous—and we’re wasting time not addressing the real threat
item.description: We should not be forced to continue to rely on oil, a global commodity subject to supply cuts, blockades, and wars.

item.title: S&P 500 set to ease away from record heights at Friday’s open — follow live
Richard Branson-backed firm’s dream of flying people to the stratosphere in balloons is deflating as staff are furloughed
item.description: Space Perspective tickets cost $125,000 per person for a six-hour trip to space, with the luxury of food, drinks, and Wi-Fi.

item.title: U.S. existing-home sales fell to a 30-year low in 2024
